programme.title: Druk
Drunk
programme.desc: Druk: Directed by Thomas Vinterberg. With Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Magnus Millang, Lars Ranthe. Four high school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10288566/","name":"Druk","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTNjM2Y2ZjgtMDc5NS00MDQ1LTgyNGYtYzYwMTAyNWQwYTMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjE4NzUxNDA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four high school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10288566/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gustav_gerdes"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A stunning performance from the actors and director, that leave you absolutely speechless!","reviewBody":"I went to the cinema today to watch my third movie from Thomas Vinterberg, after watching "The Celebration"(1998) and "The Hunt"(2012) i had huge expectations for this movie. And i have to say that i got surprised even more than i thought was possible.\n\n"Another Round" or the danish title and phrase "Druk" is just a cinematic experience on another level. I as a Dane can relate to this movie, as if it were written directly to the individual citizen. The way the story is bound together with great dialogue and humor is indeed phenomenal, the way the story criticize the danish alcohol-culture is even more breathtaking, and thought-provoking. With of course amazing performances from Lars Ranthe, Thomas Bo Larsen, Magnus Millang and Mads Mikkelsen. You can really feel that the actors and crew have been working hard on this task, and all turned out great. Once again Vinterberg have done it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":103730,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-24","keywords":"heavy drinking,drinking,teacher,high school,friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4070162713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ4NGY3ZWEtMWYyMy00MzY4LWFlNzktYjdmMGFjYTIxNGJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXN3aWZ0dw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ4NGY3ZWEtMWYyMy00MzY4LWFlNzktYjdmMGFjYTIxNGJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXN3aWZ0dw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends, all high school teachers, test a theory that they will improve their lives by maintaining a constant level of alcohol in their blood."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586568/","name":"Mads Mikkelsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0488917/","name":"Thomas Bo Larsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2099237/","name":"Magnus Millang"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0899121/","name":"Thomas Vinterberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136662/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001935/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0338571/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0899121/","name":"Thomas Vinterberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2105585/","name":"Tobias Lindholm"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: En 1978, Didier Mathure, brillant ingénieur, est responsable d'une importante mission spatiale. Mais le projet est abandonné après l'explosion de la fusée peu après le décollage à Kourou, en Guyane. Après le désastre industriel, il est muté au Gepan, le groupe d'étude et d'information sur les phénomènes aérospatiaux non identifiés. Didier se rend dans un village en pleine campagne où un couple de retraités a été témoin d'une apparition étrange.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Didier Mathure accepte de diriger momentanément le Gepan. Il découvre surplace une équipe de scientifiques motivés et très organisés dans ce jeune service qui dépend du Cnes. Par ailleurs, Didier recherche le témoin qui a aperçu un OVNI en Camargue et dont la voiture a été récupérée par la gendarmerie. Ce dernier travaille comme vendeur au sein d'une petite entreprise.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Pour expliquer les mystérieuses apparitions lumineuses en aperçues par les habitants du village de Camargue, l'armée explique que des opérations de déminage d'obus de la Seconde guerre mondiale ont eu lieu ce soir-là. Didier s'intéresse à tous les dossiers du Gepan mentionnant des perturbations électro-magnétiques. Il découvre par ailleurs que plusieurs oiseaux ont été irradiés par un engin radioactif.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: L'entente cordiale
L'entente cordiale
programme.desc: L'entente cordiale: Directed by Vincent De Brus. With Christian Clavier, Daniel Auteuil, Jennifer Saunders, John Cleese. Francois de la Conchet, an aristocrat of high moral principles, is going to resume his service to the homeland. His mission is simple: to become an intermediary in the return of a stolen microchip at a cost of $ 25 million." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0450615/","name":"L'entente cordiale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI4NTE1MjEzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDAyODk0Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Francois de la Conchet, an aristocrat of high moral principles, is going to resume his service to the homeland. His mission is simple: to become an intermediary in the return of a stolen microchip at a cost of $ 25 million.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0450615/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brain off entertainment","reviewBody":"This film is about a French diplomat and a translator going onto a trip to save a special chip from hands of foreign governments.\n\nThe initial 10 minutes look very promising, with a James Bond style opening. I really like the soundtrack too. However, the story quickly becomes implausible, but it is still entertaining to watch. This film has a big budget, and hence has helicopters, nice hotels, classical mansions. Even if the story is less than perfect, it is still pleasing to watch. Though this film is a little lousy, but it is still watchable for some brain off entertainment. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 7694874, Title: Friheden, --- Description: Friheden: Created by Thor Bjørn Krebs, Mikkel Serup. With Lars Ranthe, Lene Maria Christensen, Kasper Løfvall Stensbirk, Emma B. Marott. A married couple must dust off the skills of their youth when they are forced to carry out one final million-euro con. Can they save their marriage, secure the money and pick up their eight-year-old in time for curling practice?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7694874/","name":"Friheden","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM2MzM3NGUtMzc0Mi00MWE1LWFjNzQtMGVlYzFmYzliNTliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjcyMjcwODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A married couple must dust off the skills of their youth when they are forced to carry out one final million-euro con. Can they save their marriage, secure the money and pick up their eight-year-old in time for curling practice?","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7694874/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"nonsensefans","dateCreated":"2020-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliant story with Superb Acting","reviewBody":"Very good series to binge watch ! programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Après la disparition mystérieuse de l'oiseau atteint par la radioactivité, Didier Mathure se retrouve sans éléments tangibles pour pousuivre son enquête. Pour autant, en arrivant en retard à un rendez-vous, le scientifique constate que sa montre et celles des membres de son équipe retardent étrangement de douze minutes. Par ailleurs, André, l'ancien chef du Gepan, adresse à Didier et Marcel un élément menant à un témoin important.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Marcel et Didier ont rendez-vous dans une chambre d'hôtel avec André. Une fois sur place, ils sont accueillis par Héléna Korska, l'assistante du physicien Andreï Sakharov. La jeune femme russe prétend que l'ancien chef du Gepan lui a donné rendez-vous dans cet hôtel pour lui remettre des preuves irréfutables sur l'existence des extraterrestres. De son côté, Véra quitte le Gepan pour devenir membre du mouvement du Nouvel ordre cosmique.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Le Nouvel ordre cosmique, le mouvement spirituel lancé par Zorel, l'homme qui prétend avoir été enlévé par des extraterrestres, fait de nombreux adeptes. Au Cnes, la commission chargée d'enquêter sur l'explosion de la fusée à Kourou doit rendre ses conclusions. Bernard, l'un des responsables, est prêt à tout pour faire porter le chapeau à Didier. Ses chances d'intégrer l'Angence spatiale européenne sont désormais minces.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Paris Police 1900
Paris Police 1900
programme.desc: Paris Police 1900: Created by Fabien Nury. With Jérémie Laheurte, Evelyne Brochu, Thibaut Evrard, Marc Barbé. Paris, France, 1899. The corpse of an unknown woman is found in the river Seine. The investigation will push a young ambitious inspector to discover a heavy state secret." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10840070/","name":"Paris Police 1900","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY4NmNlYzQtOWI2NS00OTA1LTgzZjAtOTQzMzVmMDI4ZWVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Crime","Drama","History"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5398167/","name":"Jérémie Laheurte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2903342/","name":"Evelyne Brochu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5198870/","name":"Thibaut Evrard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0341057/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1942997/","name":"Fabien Nury"}],"datePublished":"2021-02-08","description":"Paris, France, 1899. The corpse of an unknown woman is found in the river Seine. The investigation will push a young ambitious inspector to discover a heavy state secret.","keywords":"investigation,french police,paris france,france,belle epoque","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10840070/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"searchanddestroy-1"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting but one big default....","reviewBody":"I admit that this series is very daring and inventive, especially for those craving for history matters, for people interested in facts never told before. This TV show is pulled by an awesome production design, supported by so many accurate details and problems which existed one hundred years ago. But this doesn't prevent the whole job to be messy, with no control of the story, a scheme where you have the feeling that are too much ingredients: crime, politics, drama, thriller, romance, comedy. The creator himself admitted to have insisted on the purpose to please ANYONE, to reach the largest audiences. I won't compare this strategy with CASA DEL PAPEL crap, though I perfectly could after all, but as I have already said, I hate this kind of point of view, reaching the largest audiences, because the result is not always the quality of the show. So, if you want to learn about French politics of the early 1900's, that OK, that's definitely for you. To summarize, that remains French on the shape, BUT not on the background, NOT on the message: to teach modern audiences what the politics of those years were.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":367,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Marcel et Didier ont rendez-vous dans une chambre d'hôtel avec André. Une fois sur place, ils sont accueillis par Héléna Korska, l'assistante du physicien Andreï Sakharov. La jeune femme russe prétend que l'ancien chef du Gepan lui a donné rendez-vous dans cet hôtel pour lui remettre des preuves irréfutables sur l'existence des extraterrestres. De son côté, Véra quitte le Gepan pour devenir membre du mouvement du Nouvel ordre cosmique.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Le Nouvel ordre cosmique, le mouvement spirituel lancé par Zorel, l'homme qui prétend avoir été enlévé par des extraterrestres, fait de nombreux adeptes. Au Cnes, la commission chargée d'enquêter sur l'explosion de la fusée à Kourou doit rendre ses conclusions. Bernard, l'un des responsables, est prêt à tout pour faire porter le chapeau à Didier. Ses chances d'intégrer l'Angence spatiale européenne sont désormais minces.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 3743822, Title: Fear the Walking Dead, --- Description: Fear the Walking Dead: Created by Dave Erickson, Robert Kirkman. With Alycia Debnam-Carey, Colman Domingo, Danay Garcia, Rubén Blades. A Walking Dead spinoff set in Los Angeles, California. Follows two families who must band together to survive the undead apocalypse." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3743822/","name":"Fear the Walking Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZkYTRjMWQtZThiOS00MjJlLWFkNDktNzNhODNhOWNlNjdjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A Walking Dead spinoff set in Los Angeles, California. Follows two families who must band together to survive the undead apocalypse.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3743822/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ahmetkozan","dateCreated":"2016-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"A spin-off that takes to the start of the zombie apocalypse!","reviewBody":"It's a real shame that most people rate shows on a "0 or 10" scale. Most of the complaining I hear about this show stem from people wanting it to be more like TWD. If you'd like to see something that is not TWD, but exists in the same universe--I think that's called a "spin-off"--then this show is that. Different places, different faces. Some of the characters make dumb choices, some are boring, and some are annoying. Viewers really seem to hate "realism" despite always screaming for it. 

It's not perfect. I could gripe about the things I don't like, but they are minor when compared to the fact that I'm really enjoying watching how things progressed while Rick was in a coma. It offers nothing in the way of explaining the zombies (that's a good thing), but is showing really well how panic and mobs of humans actually paved the way for zombies to swoop right in and eat everyone. 

If you want to enjoy this show, turn off your silly expectations about it being like TWD, and just watch while convincingly-real and flawed humans deal with a fast-moving crisis that no one seems to understand. It's easy for viewers to forget that these new characters don't have years of experience in the zombie world, so it just looks like some weird virus that makes people crazy and hard to kill. 7/10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":118840,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2015-08-23","keywords":"image comics,zombie apocalypse,based on comic,spin off,undead","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225332/","name":"Kim Dickens","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0226817/","name":"Frank Dillane","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193295/","name":"Cliff Curtis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090153/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0470348/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1129521/","name":"Dave Erickson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3079117/","name":"Robert Kirkman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Comic-Con Season 6 Teaser Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2474294809","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNmM2RhODgtZmNhNS00MWQ3LWJkZTctNzBlYjBlOWRlZDQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNmM2RhODgtZmNhNS00MWQ3LWJkZTctNzBlYjBlOWRlZDQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""Fear the Walking Dead" returns to AMC on Oct. 11."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Paris Police 1900
Paris Police 1900
programme.desc: Paris Police 1900: Created by Fabien Nury. With Jérémie Laheurte, Evelyne Brochu, Thibaut Evrard, Marc Barbé. Paris, France, 1899. The corpse of an unknown woman is found in the river Seine. The investigation will push a young ambitious inspector to discover a heavy state secret." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10840070/","name":"Paris Police 1900","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY4NmNlYzQtOWI2NS00OTA1LTgzZjAtOTQzMzVmMDI4ZWVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Crime","Drama","History"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5398167/","name":"Jérémie Laheurte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2903342/","name":"Evelyne Brochu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5198870/","name":"Thibaut Evrard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0341057/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1942997/","name":"Fabien Nury"}],"datePublished":"2021-02-08","description":"Paris, France, 1899. The corpse of an unknown woman is found in the river Seine. The investigation will push a young ambitious inspector to discover a heavy state secret.","keywords":"investigation,french police,paris france,france,belle epoque","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10840070/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"searchanddestroy-1"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting but one big default....","reviewBody":"I admit that this series is very daring and inventive, especially for those craving for history matters, for people interested in facts never told before. This TV show is pulled by an awesome production design, supported by so many accurate details and problems which existed one hundred years ago. But this doesn't prevent the whole job to be messy, with no control of the story, a scheme where you have the feeling that are too much ingredients: crime, politics, drama, thriller, romance, comedy. The creator himself admitted to have insisted on the purpose to please ANYONE, to reach the largest audiences. I won't compare this strategy with CASA DEL PAPEL crap, though I perfectly could after all, but as I have already said, I hate this kind of point of view, reaching the largest audiences, because the result is not always the quality of the show. So, if you want to learn about French politics of the early 1900's, that OK, that's definitely for you. To summarize, that remains French on the shape, BUT not on the background, NOT on the message: to teach modern audiences what the politics of those years were.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":367,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7}}</script><metacontent="

The corpse of an unknown woman is found in the river Seine. The investigation will push a young ambitious inspector to discover a heavy state secret.","keywords":"investigation,french police,paris france,france,belle epoque","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10840070/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"searchanddestroy-1","dateCreated":"2021-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting but one big default....","reviewBody":"I admit that this series is very daring and inventive, especially for those craving for history matters, for people interested in facts never told before. This TV show is pulled by an awesome production design, supported by so many accurate details and problems which existed one hundred years ago. But this doesn't prevent the whole job to be messy, with no control of the story, a scheme where you have the feeling that are too much ingredients: crime, politics, drama, thriller, romance, comedy. The creator himself admitted to have insisted on the purpose to please ANYONE, to reach the largest audiences. I won't compare this strategy with CASA DEL PAPEL crap, though I perfectly could after all, but as I have already said, I hate this kind of point of view, reaching the largest audiences, because the result is not always the quality of the show. So, if you want to learn about French politics of the early 1900's, that OK, that's definitely for you. To summarize, that remains French on the shape, BUT not on the background, NOT on the message: to teach modern audiences what the politics of those years were.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":367,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mamá cumple 100 años
Maman a cent ans
programme.desc:
Mamá cumple 100 años: Directed by Carlos Saura. With Geraldine Chaplin, Amparo Muñoz, Fernando Fernán Gómez, Norman Briski. Ana is alive and married with Antonio; they arrive in the manor in the countryside of Spain where she worked as a nanny many years ago, for the centennial birthday of the matriarch. In their reunion, she finds that Jose died three years ago; Juan left his wife Luchy; Fernando is still living with his mother and unsuccessfully trying to fly a hang glider; and the three little girls are grown-up. Further, she discovers that the dysfunctional family is completely broken, and Luchy in embezzling mother's money. When Juan arrives for the celebration, he plots with Fernando and Luchy to kill the mother to get the inheritance. Meanwhile, Antonio has a brief affair with Natalia." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0079517/","name":"Mamá cumple 100 años","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJmNTdlNTktNDk5Yy00ZGU2LTllMzgtNmYxZWI0Nzg5ZjdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ana is alive and married with Antonio; they arrive in the manor in the countryside of Spain where she worked as a nanny many years ago, for the centennial birthday of the matriarch. In their reunion, she finds that Jose died three ye","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0079517/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Miksa76"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Grandma is 100 years old","reviewBody":"This is one hilarious film. I remember watching it over and over again on our VCR when I was about 12 years old. I recall being fascinated with this fantastic family, which was nothing like our bleak, Scandinavian existence! I saw it about 10 times...

It's about the grandma's centennial birthday, which gathers together all the family, with their marital and family problems. Some have schemes and plots to embezzle the family's money. The themes also deal with generation-gap and cultural environment in Franco's Spain. However, the Grandma is larger-than-life figure, almost akin to the creations of magical realism. She's able to have, for example, a telepathic connection with her granddaughter. Her son Federico is a "mad scientist" and a dreamer.

The whole film is set in the country house and it's surroundings. All the characters are colourful and rich, funny and tragical. The actress playing the Grand old lady does a terrific job!! Besides, the film is well shot, and the music echoes richly in memories of the persons.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1178,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1979-11-07","keywords":"full frontal female nudity,attempted flight,memory,hang glider,glider","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001036/","name":"Geraldine Chaplin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0616361/","name":"Amparo Muñoz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0273178/","name":"Fernando Fernán Gómez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0767022/","name":"Carlos Saura"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020931/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065243/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060888/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0767022/","name":"Carlos Saura"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Spalicek: Directed by Jirí Trnka. Puppet animation feature consisting of different segments related to the traditions and emotions of the seasons as a typical year passes among the Czech people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0227528/","name":"Spalicek","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDU0ZDg5ZDQtNjFkMS00YTQ1LTk1MmItNTNlNDEyZGYzM2RlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDUxNjc5NjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Puppet animation feature consisting of different segments related to the traditions and emotions of the seasons as a typical year passes among the Czech people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0227528/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The seasons","reviewBody":"It is always interesting seeing stop motion animation and especially the older stop motion animation. It can be old-fashioned but very charmingly so, have more often than not found it lovely to watch and at its best magical. Never being too crude or trying to do too much. What has been seen of Jiri Trnka's work is really quite impressive and he and his films are deserving of more credit now if gems such as 'A Midsummer Night's Dream' (review to come) is to come by.

'The Czech Year' is another lovely film of his and a very well done tribute to the seasons and the traditions that come with them, with a good concept that is not wasted. Did like the structure, with a series of segments revolving around each season of the year (hence the title) and 'The Czech Year' does a very nice job with it. Though do agree that 'The Czech Seasons' would have been a slightly more fitting title. As far as Trnka's films go, this is one of his best and one of his most interesting, subject-wise it is quite different for him.

Perfect 'The Czech Year' isn't. Those not familiar with the Czech language and/or the older stop motion/puppet animation style, on top of perhaps a more deliberate pace may find themselves alienated on first glance, so 'The Czech Year' is perhaps not the best place to start getting into Trnka's films. 'A Midsummer Night's Dream' is perhaps a better choice for introduction.

Flaws are very few though, with the only major issue being the pace being over-deliberate in spots especially in the slighter sections.

Visually however, 'The Czech Year' looks great. The characters are detailed and full of life and the sceneries are colourful and atmospheric, old-fashioned yes but in an endearing way. The music is full of energy and beauty of tone, with a real feel for the period and a nostalgic Czech folklore vibe at times. The sung words don't ramble or get cheesy or schmaltzy. The characters are as alive in personality as they are in look and are engaging.

While the story is basically a series of segments revolving around the seasons, this is handled cleverly and not in too episodic a way. Actually found myself learning a good deal about the beautiful to watch and interesting seasonal traditions and emotionally it's done beautifully. Very slight and uneventful on occasions, but very charming and fascinates a good deal. The writing is not used too much and has a nice variety of tone.

Concluding, well worth seeing. 8/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":86,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"genre":["Animation"],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0873240/","name":"Jirí Trnka"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114156/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093976/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114183/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0873240/","name":"Jirí Trnka"}],"duration":"PT1H15M"}</script><metacontent="

Puppet animation feature consisting of different segments related to the traditions and emotions of the seasons as a typical year passes among the Czech people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0227528/","name":"Spalicek","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDU0ZDg5ZDQtNjFkMS00YTQ1LTk1MmItNTNlNDEyZGYzM2RlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDUxNjc5NjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Puppet animation feature consisting of different segments related to the traditions and emotions of the seasons as a typical year passes among the Czech people.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0227528/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird","dateCreated":"2021-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The seasons","reviewBody":"It is always interesting seeing stop motion animation and especially the older stop motion animation. It can be old-fashioned but very charmingly so, have more often than not found it lovely to watch and at its best magical. Never being too crude or trying to do too much. What has been seen of Jiri Trnka's work is really quite impressive and he and his films are deserving of more credit now if gems such as 'A Midsummer Night's Dream' (review to come) is to come by.

'The Czech Year' is another lovely film of his and a very well done tribute to the seasons and the traditions that come with them, with a good concept that is not wasted. Did like the structure, with a series of segments revolving around each season of the year (hence the title) and 'The Czech Year' does a very nice job with it. Though do agree that 'The Czech Seasons' would have been a slightly more fitting title. As far as Trnka's films go, this is one of his best and one of his most interesting, subject-wise it is quite different for him.

Perfect 'The Czech Year' isn't. Those not familiar with the Czech language and/or the older stop motion/puppet animation style, on top of perhaps a more deliberate pace may find themselves alienated on first glance, so 'The Czech Year' is perhaps not the best place to start getting into Trnka's films. 'A Midsummer Night's Dream' is perhaps a better choice for introduction.

Flaws are very few though, with the only major issue being the pace being over-deliberate in spots especially in the slighter sections.

Visually however, 'The Czech Year' looks great. The characters are detailed and full of life and the sceneries are colourful and atmospheric, old-fashioned yes but in an endearing way. The music is full of energy and beauty of tone, with a real feel for the period and a nostalgic Czech folklore vibe at times. The sung words don't ramble or get cheesy or schmaltzy. The characters are as alive in personality as they are in look and are engaging.

While the story is basically a series of segments revolving around the seasons, this is handled cleverly and not in too episodic a way. Actually found myself learning a good deal about the beautiful to watch and interesting seasonal traditions and emotionally it's done beautifully. Very slight and uneventful on occasions, but very charming and fascinates a good deal. The writing is not used too much and has a nice variety of tone.

Concluding, well worth seeing. 8/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":86,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"genre":["Animation"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0873240/","name":"Jirí Trnka"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114156/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093976/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114183/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0873240/","name":"Jirí Trnka"],"duration":"PT1H15M"</script><metacontent="

Falbalas
Falbalas
programme.desc: Falbalas: Directed by Jacques Becker. With Raymond Rouleau, Micheline Presle, Jean Chevrier, Gabrielle Dorziat. Philippe Clarence, a famous Parisian dressmaker, seduces his friend's fiancee. But, for the 1st time in his life, this is for real. The film is also a sharp picture of the fashion world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0035853/","name":"Falbalas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUwNDU2YTMtZWJlOC00YzAwLThiNjQtY2Q5MzQwYWFlM2JkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM2NTg3Nzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Philippe Clarence, a famous Parisian dressmaker, seduces his friend's fiancee. But, for the 1st time in his life, this is for real. The film is also a sharp picture of the fashion world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0035853/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"richardchatten"},"dateCreated":"2017-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Frills & Spills","reviewBody":"The first of Jacques Becker's films to bear the credit "Un film de Jacques Becker", thus attesting to his growing stature within the industry. \n\nHaving essayed a French equivalent of 'Cold Comfort Farm' during the Occupation with 'Goupi Mains Rouges', Becker next made a characteristic about turn to provide a bit of glossy escapism shot before the Liberation but released in 1945 with this hothouse drama set within the frivolous and insulated world of Parisian haute couture. Christian Dior's 'New Look' being still two years away, the woman all wear wartime padded suits and terrifying frizzy big hair, through the midst of which struts the fox in this henhouse, designer Raymond Rouleau, who exercises droit du seigneur with a new model played by a baby-faced Micheline Presle before he comes a spectacular cropper when he becomes genuinely besotted with her.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":483,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1946-03-15","keywords":"1940s,one word title,haute couture,fashion designer,fashion house","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0745700/","name":"Raymond Rouleau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0696163/","name":"Micheline Presle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0156761/","name":"Jean Chevrier"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065442/","name":"Jacques Becker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030039/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0270091/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0041279/","name":"Maurice Aubergé"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065442/","name":"Jacques Becker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0341071/","name":"Maurice Griffe"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tarawa Beachhead
Tarawa, tête de pont
programme.desc: Tarawa Beachhead: Directed by Paul Wendkos. With Kerwin Mathews, Julie Adams, Ray Danton, Karen Sharpe. A marine sergeant witnesses a captain kill one of their men at Guadalcanal to cover his own incompetence, and fears he won't be believed because of rank, so finds the captain has gotten him assigned to his next command plus is cozying up to the family of his victim." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0052272/","name":"Tarawa Beachhead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAzMzgyZjItMjlhNy00NmJiLWI1OGMtOGU1OGExZWZmYzAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzg1ODEwNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A marine sergeant witnesses a captain kill one of their men at Guadalcanal to cover his own incompetence, and fears he won't be believed because of rank, so finds the captain has gotten him assigned to his next command plus is cozyin","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0052272/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogersde"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"B Movie Reuses Scenes from "Sands of Iwo Jima"","reviewBody":"Meh, it's a B movie from the 50s, running only 77 minutes. It's not terrible, but don't expect to see much that's accurate about the Battle of Tarawa...except perhaps for the justification for choosing the Central Pacific route to Japan rather than going exclusively through Australia, New Guinea, and the Philippines. As in "Battle Cry," another film concerning the 2nd Marine Division prior to Tarawa, much of the film is set in New Zealand, but some of the purported Kiwis have accents from no farther west than California and hair styles no older than the late 1950s. If you've seen "Sands of Iwo Jima," you'll recognize much of the battle and beach footage, just stuck into this movie in between dialogue scenes in order to avoid having to pay to stage it again, I guess. Some accurate, some inaccurate combat film is inserted; as for the latter, amphibious tanks and vehicles with Army markings spoil the mood if you're trying to get a feel for the real Tarawa, as do broad, sandy beaches and lush, intact vegetation. The hatred between the main characters is well done, and the villain is a good mix of hero and coward. The trope of the woman burned badly by losing a husband at war and determined never to fall in love again is on full display (as in "Battle Cry" and "The Americanization of Emily").","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Drama","War"],"datePublished":"1958-11-02","keywords":"explosion,hand grenade,rifle,m1 rifle,u.s. marines","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0558663/","name":"Kerwin Mathews"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0011105/","name":"Julie Adams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0200645/","name":"Ray Danton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0920862/","name":"Paul Wendkos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0072431/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0671766/","name":"Richard Alan Simmons"}],"duration":"PT1H17M"}</script><metacontent="

Darling Lili
programme.desc: Darling Lili: Directed by Blake Edwards. With Julie Andrews, Rock Hudson, Jeremy Kemp, Lance Percival. Set during World War I, this movie is a cute spin on the Mata Hari legend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0065611/","name":"Darling Lili","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY2ZDI2NDMtYTc0NC00ODY0LThiODktNzhlZWFjMzk5OWY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjMwMjk0MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set during World War I, this movie is a cute spin on the Mata Hari legend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0065611/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Falco-8"},"dateCreated":"1999-04-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Who wrote the checks for this dud?","reviewBody":"Julie and Blake deliver a real bomb {no pun intended}of a World War 1 musical with this sloppily made mega budget mess. Julie's voice is always a joy, but the music here is of the "in one ear, out the other" variety. Hudson shows all the romantic magnetism of a buttered scone and his scenes with Julie hold about as much spark as my 1987 Yugo. The comic relief is painfully unfunny, the flying scenes ho hum {with most of the aircraft and even one of the stars, Jeremy Kemp, rehashed from "The Blue Max"}and the whole experience just makes me glad that I saw this on free TV. Its a long way to Tipperary alright, this movie is closer to Verdun...."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2126,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Musical"],"datePublished":"1970-06-24","keywords":"louvre museum,war romance,attempted assassination,rain,woman in jeopardy","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000267/","name":"Julie Andrews"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001369/","name":"Rock Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447305/","name":"Jeremy Kemp"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001175/","name":"Blake Edwards"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0155420/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001175/","name":"Blake Edwards"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0087861/","name":"William Peter Blatty"}],"duration":"PT2H16M"}</script><metacontent="

Set during World War I, this movie is a cute spin on the Mata Hari legend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0065611/","name":"Darling Lili","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY2ZDI2NDMtYTc0NC00ODY0LThiODktNzhlZWFjMzk5OWY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjMwMjk0MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set during World War I, this movie is a cute spin on the Mata Hari legend.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0065611/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Falco-8","dateCreated":"1999-04-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Who wrote the checks for this dud?","reviewBody":"Julie and Blake deliver a real bomb no pun intendedof a World War 1 musical with this sloppily made mega budget mess. Julie's voice is always a joy, but the music here is of the "in one ear, out the other" variety. Hudson shows all the romantic magnetism of a buttered scone and his scenes with Julie hold about as much spark as my 1987 Yugo. The comic relief is painfully unfunny, the flying scenes ho hum with most of the aircraft and even one of the stars, Jeremy Kemp, rehashed from "The Blue Max"and the whole experience just makes me glad that I saw this on free TV. Its a long way to Tipperary alright, this movie is closer to Verdun....","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2126,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Musical"],"datePublished":"1970-06-24","keywords":"louvre museum,war romance,attempted assassination,rain,woman in jeopardy","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000267/","name":"Julie Andrews","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001369/","name":"Rock Hudson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447305/","name":"Jeremy Kemp"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001175/","name":"Blake Edwards"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0155420/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001175/","name":"Blake Edwards","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0087861/","name":"William Peter Blatty"],"duration":"PT2H16M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Man in the White Suit
The Man in the White Suit
programme.desc: The Man in the White Suit: Directed by Alexander Mackendrick. With Alec Guinness, Joan Greenwood, Cecil Parker, Michael Gough. An altruistic chemist invents a fabric which resists wear and stain as a boon to humanity, but big business and labor realize it must be suppressed for economic reasons." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0044876/","name":"The Man in the White Suit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNTIzNzY4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODExMTI0NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An altruistic chemist invents a fabric which resists wear and stain as a boon to humanity, but big business and labor realize it must be suppressed for economic reasons.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0044876/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rupie"},"dateCreated":"2000-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"another Ealing Studios gem!","reviewBody":"I can't say whether the post-WWII British comedies produced at the Ealing Studios are an acquired taste or not, but I am completely addicted, and The Man in the White Suit is one of the best. No need to go into the well-known plot about the threat posed to both the textile industry and the textile unions by an indestructible, dirt-resistant fiber. Suffice it to say that the slings and arrows suffered by the naively idealistic Sidney Stratton in pursuing his polymer vision make for a comedic delight. Many of the well-known faces from the world of British character actors - the nervous Cecil Parker, the suavely devious Michael Gough, and the bluntly ruthless Ernest Thesinger - put in wonderful performances. Guinness - as always and forever - is superb, and Joan Greenwood is delectable as Daphne (just the way she enunciates the word "Daddy", makes the entire movie worth seeing).\n\n"Knudsen!!!!!!!"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9348,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1951-12-29","keywords":"invention,capitalism,clothing industry,textile industry,capital vs labor","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Man in the White Suit","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi929934873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5YzFiM2YtN2FmYS00ZGZjLTkxMmMtYzVkNjNhMTE1MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5YzFiM2YtN2FmYS00ZGZjLTkxMmMtYzVkNjNhMTE1MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Man in the White Suit"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000027/","name":"Alec Guinness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339343/","name":"Joan Greenwood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0662116/","name":"Cecil Parker"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0533241/","name":"Alexander Mackendrick"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040024/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532032/","name":"Roger MacDougall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0226538/","name":"John Dighton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0533241/","name":"Alexander Mackendrick"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Peeping Tom
Le voyeur
programme.desc: Peeping Tom: Directed by Michael Powell. With Karlheinz Böhm, Moira Shearer, Anna Massey, Maxine Audley. A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0054167/","name":"Peeping Tom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjM3ZTAzZDYtZmFjZS00YmQ1LWJlOWEtN2I4MDRmYzY5YmRlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjgyNjk3MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0054167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Bunuel1976"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Peeping Tom (1960)","reviewBody":"I've watched Michael Powell['s PEEPING TOM a couple of times on TV but I've yet to give my Criterion DVD a spin. Certainly one of the most original, challenging and bleakest films ever made and to have come from a British film-maker, albeit an iconoclastic one, makes the achievement all the more remarkable. While I do think that comparisons to its contemporary PSYCHO (1960) are a bit tenuous, it has to be said that both films can be thought of as belonging to the horror genre  in fact, PEEPING TOM was the third British "slasher" movie in a row, following HORRORS OF THE BLACK MUSEUM (1959) and CIRCUS OF HORRORS (1960) - but can also lay claim to being a very dark sort of black comedy. Besides, both films feature dysfunctional, immature, adult male protagonists haunted by a terrible upbringing which vents itself in a series of murders. Furthermore, while both films have been harshly reviled by critics when first released, in time, they have had their reputations make a complete about face and nowadays are numbered among their respective directors' unassailable masterpieces!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33172,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1960-05-16","keywords":"serial killer,filmmaking,voyeurism,pornography,peeping tom","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Peeping Tom","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3348824345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRhNTE1NTMtMWFkMi00NzVmLWExZjAtMzMyNjI4NTYyNTUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRhNTE1NTMtMWFkMi00NzVmLWExZjAtMzMyNjI4NTYyNTUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Peeping Tom"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003337/","name":"Karlheinz Böhm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557281/","name":"Anna Massey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0790452/","name":"Moira Shearer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003836/","name":"Michael Powell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040391/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0548896/","name":"Leo Marks"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dr Jekyll & Sister Hyde
Dr Jekyll et Sister Hyde
programme.desc:
Dr Jekyll & Sister Hyde: Directed by Roy Ward Baker. With Ralph Bates, Martine Beswick, Gerald Sim, Lewis Fiander. A Victorian scientist tests a serum that transforms him into a sensuous murderess." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0068502/","name":"Dr Jekyll & Sister Hyde","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGQ1MTM4NWUtN2UwYi00MTkxLTlmODItNzkwMGExNGE5NDdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjUwMzI2NzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Victorian scientist tests a serum that transforms him into a sensuous murderess.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0068502/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kriitikko"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Jekyll & Hyde + Burke & Hare + Jack the Ripper= interesting film from Hammer","reviewBody":"London. We see first how Jack the Ripper kills one whore. Then we see that Ripper actually is Dr. Jekyll. Jekyll has killed womens to produced he's "elixir of life". But when he drinks it he becomes a sexy and evil femme fatale Hyde.

Sounds like a bad film? It is not. 

This is one of few interesting horror films from Hammer at 70's. Director Roy Ward Baker(Vampyre Lowers) has made a film that really takes you at the late of 19's century. Ralph Bates(Horror of Frankenstein) is good as "the Ripper" Jekyll. In this version Jekyll has to do evil before he drinks the elixir. That make story more interesting. Jekyll first robs the graves with criminals called Burke and Hare(famous real life body snatchers from Edinburgh). Then he has to kill to do good. And when he finally takes a drink things are rally getting on. Martine Beswick(One million years B.C.) is beautiful, sexy and wicked as sister Hyde.

It is a good film. But still... I think that(as a fan of Robert Louis Stevenson's story)this could work better if writer/producer Brian Clemens would have made two films. One of Jekyll & Hyde, another of Jack the Ripper. But after all this, it is worth to see.

But do not watch that comedy Dr. Jekyll and ms. Hyde. That sucked so much!!!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2626,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1971-10-17","keywords":"looking at oneself in a mirror,london england,19th century,victorian era,evil woman","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dr Jekyll And Sister Hyde","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4159112217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc1NDBlYjMtZDg2ZS00ZDk0LTg2OWUtMzJiNGJhNjBkM2U5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc1NDBlYjMtZDg2ZS00ZDk0LTg2OWUtMzJiNGJhNjBkM2U5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this Hammer Production take on the classic story"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0061012/","name":"Ralph Bates"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000936/","name":"Martine Beswick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799245/","name":"Gerald Sim"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001928/","name":"Roy Ward Baker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060069/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829044/","name":"Robert Louis Stevenson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0166018/","name":"Brian Clemens"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: M*A*S*H
M.A.S.H.
programme.desc:
M*A*S*H: Directed by Robert Altman. With Donald Sutherland, Elliott Gould, Tom Skerritt, Sally Kellerman. The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and high jinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0066026/","name":"M*A*S*H","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNjM2NlN2MtOWYyOS00NmY5LThhYjMtMDc1Y2U4OTU4MDNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwNDgzNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and high jinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0066026/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"runamokprods"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Clearly an important part of film history, but the years haven't been kind to it (in my eyes)","reviewBody":"I should probably watch this again, since so many consider it a masterpiece. Maybe I was over-prepared (Hey, it took me a second viewing of 'Citizen Kane' to get my past pre-set expectations!). But while I could see why M*A*S*H was groundbreaking and important for a Hollywood film of it's day (lack of the usual clear narrative line, anti-war stance, overlapping, improvised dialogue, sexuality, bloody operating room scenes serving as ironic counterpart, etc), it felt pretty dated and unfocused. There are some very funny moments, but a lot of the ironies seem easy, and there's a lack of a true darker underpinnings and ideas, unlike, say, 'Dr. Strangelove'. 

A lot of the humor is juvenile, cruel and silly. And while I get that's the point – nothing can be more deeply juvenile, cruel and silly than war, it got repetitive and heavy handed after a while. The performances are good, but beyond Robert Duvall, none of the characters have much in the way of dimensions. People stay exactly what we think they are from the moment we meet them. 

Walter Chow makes a good argument on the web site 'Film Freak Central', that the sexism, homophobia, etc are the whole point. Altman is saying we're ALL beasts at heart, even if we act like we're bucking the system. It's an interesting idea, but I'm not sure I buy it's what Altman was intending.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":69797,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"1970-03-18","keywords":"surgeon,nurse,satire,black comedy,irreverence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mash","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3013083417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc1OWRiYjctZDE4Ni00YWNlLTgwZTEtOWQ0YWZkZGUwNmNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc1OWRiYjctZDE4Ni00YWNlLTgwZTEtOWQ0YWZkZGUwNmNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000661/","name":"Donald Sutherland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001285/","name":"Elliott Gould"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000643/","name":"Tom Skerritt"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000265/","name":"Robert Altman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029048/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046078/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0393645/","name":"Richard Hooker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0488057/","name":"Ring Lardner Jr."}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride
La chevauchée des sept mercenaires
programme.desc: The Magnificent Seven Ride!: Directed by George McCowan. With Lee Van Cleef, Stefanie Powers, Michael Callan, Mariette Hartley. Forced by personal circumstances, Marshal Chris Adams recruits a writer and five prisoners to help him eliminate a gang of Mexican bandits." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0068897/","name":"The Magnificent Seven Ride!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1Nzg5NDAwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM1ODE1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forced by personal circumstances, Marshal Chris Adams recruits a writer and five prisoners to help him eliminate a gang of Mexican bandits.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0068897/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2007-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Acceptable and passable sequel with a revenger Lee Van Cleef , post-Sergio Leone","reviewBody":"This is the last sequel to ¨Magnificent seven¨ with the skinny Lee Van Cleef as tough gunslinger named Chris (whose character was played by Yul Brynner in two occasions and one performed by Lee Van Cleef and George Kennedy). He's nowadays as sheriff , Marshal Chris Adams , who turns down a friend's request to help stop the depredations of a band of Mexican bandits , but then his spouse (Mariette Hartley) has been kidnapped by a gang . When his wife is abducted by bank thieves and his friend is murdered capturing the last outlaw , Chris feels obligated to take up his partner's cause . Then Chris along with a journalist (Michael Callan) set off in pursuit bandit gunfighters (Gary Busey among them) , as he recruits five prisoners to track down the desperadoes . Besides , Chris helping his buddy (Ralph Waite) must free a Mexican village (inhabited by women as Stefanie Powers , among others) besieged by nasty outlaws who are devastating the small location . Lee van Cleef is decided to take a group of prisoners and strike a blow against the Mexican bandits . He goes to Tucson Territorial Prison where a bunch of misfits , murderers , robbers , rapists and other prisoners (with a TV star-studded cast such as Pedro Armendariz , Luke Askew, William Lucking, Ed Lauter, and James B. Sikking ) get a chance to redeem themselves . As Chris recruits various Magnificent Men and once again defending hapless people from their oppressors . As a brand of new seven , doing their number , they put their lives on the line and let it ride . \n\nThe last in the original series of four ¨The Magnificent Seven¨ movies , here Lee Van Cleef as Chris , substituting Yul Brynner , who played the role in two occasions , and one performed by George Kennedy . Yul Brynner insisted he would only make the sequels if Steve McQueen was not involved , McQueen felt the plot was too absurd and for this, and other reasons, was not interested anyway . Van Cleef as a two-fisted avenger sheriff is good as well as his role of ¨Sabata¨, meanwhile Yul Brynner left the Chris character for playing the ¨Cleef's Sabata¨ role in ¨Indio Black¨ . The story is similar to previous entries , adding ¨Dirty dozen¨ wake , including customary outlaw band formed by an eclectic gang with diverse speciality , as dynamite or guns . The film gets action Western , exciting riding, shootouts, it's funny and entertaining , although nothing new but displays a television style . The movie contains some moment of grisly violence and even touching on the relationships between the women and the Magnificent . This is a drab , inferior sequel from the original and enduringly popular ¨The magnificent seven¨ (John Sturges,1960) that is equally remake to ¨The seven samurais¨ (in fact , it was Yul Brynner who approached producer Walter Mirisch with the idea of doing a Western adaptation of Akira Kurosawa's classic) . After that , followed ¨The return of the seven¨(Burt Kennedy,1966), again with Brynner and ¨Guns of the magnificent seven¨ (Paul Wendkos,1969) with George Kennedy and continued with a TV series and a Television movie realized in 1998 . As always , breathtaking and memorable musical score by the great Elmer Berstein. Elmer , whose score for the series is one of the best-known ever composed , also wrote the soundtrack for the parody of this film, 'Three amigos'. Appropriate cinematography by expert cameraman Fred J. Koenekamp (Patton, The inferno towering, Papillon) . The motion picture was regularly directed by George McCowan , a usual TV episodes director (Charlie's Angels , Banacek , Cannon , Starsky and Hutch) . The film will appeal to Lee Van Cleef fans .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2747,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Western"],"datePublished":"1972-08-01","keywords":"arizona territory,tucson territorial prison,tucson arizona,magdalena mexico,sonora mexico","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1448198425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjIwNTZmMTUtNzQ2Yy00OGFkLWFkOTItY2I3ODA0ZTAxOWI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjIwNTZmMTUtNzQ2Yy00OGFkLWFkOTItY2I3ODA0ZTAxOWI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001812/","name":"Lee Van Cleef"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0694619/","name":"Stefanie Powers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0130286/","name":"Michael Callan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0566671/","name":"George McCowan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054562/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746473/","name":"Arthur Rowe"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Return of the Seven
Le retour des sept
programme.desc: Return of the Seven: Directed by Burt Kennedy. With Yul Brynner, Robert Fuller, Julián Mateos, Warren Oates. Two survivors of the initial Magnificent Seven outfit, Chris and Vin, recruit four new members in order to re-form the outfit and defend a few Mexican villages from attacks by vicious bandits." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0060897/","name":"Return of the Seven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJjNTNhODUtZjBmZC00ZDdiLWI5ZjUtMmIxYWYxNzYyNDk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two survivors of the initial Magnificent Seven outfit, Chris and Vin, recruit four new members in order to re-form the outfit and defend a few Mexican villages from attacks by vicious bandits.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0060897/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"csrothwec"},"dateCreated":"2010-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Have to agree with the majority of reviews; a boring remake","reviewBody":"If the 'Godfather II' was THE example of why a gifted director might consider making a sequel to a great film, this turkey is the classic counter-example of why no-one should make one (leaving aside the obvious point about wanting to milk a very successful cash cow a second time around). The only actor from the first (truly magnificent) film to appear is Yul Brynner in the lead role and all of the others who appear are decidedly 'B list' (if that) character actors who simply do not have the charisma to awaken much interest in their 'stories' or fates amongst the audience. Some attempts are made at repeating the original film's reflections on life and the transitoriness of glory/earthly admiration but in comparison with, say, Robert Vaughan's nightmares in the original film, these are stilted and unconvincing, whilst also being delivered (like most of the dialogue in the film) in a wooden, unenthusiastic manner. Even the gun fights/action scenes are poorly composed and almost totally 'flat'. The only things the film has going for it really are Bernstein's music (identical to the original) and the presence of Brynner, who could always carry a scene or, as in this case, even a whole film. I doubt if anyone would want to sit through a viewing of it more than once, though. I also suppose that one should be charitable, given what was to follow in the form of the two subsequent 'sequels' after this (by which time even Brynner had jumped ship), both of which were absolutely and totally dire, leaving the original template of a truly immortal Japanese film which underlay the whole enterprise entirely (and mercifully) forgotten.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4079,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Action","Western"],"datePublished":"1966-10-19","keywords":"two gun holster,gun holster,gun,holster,double gun holster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1893122073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGZkYjQxNzAtMDBiMi00MzNkLTkxYzMtNGVmZWMyNjYzODE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGZkYjQxNzAtMDBiMi00MzNkLTkxYzMtNGVmZWMyNjYzODE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000989/","name":"Yul Brynner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298333/","name":"Robert Fuller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0558290/","name":"Julián Mateos"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447944/","name":"Burt Kennedy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054562/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064766/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169540/","name":"Larry Cohen"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0060897, Title: Return of the Seven, --- Description: Return of the Seven: Directed by Burt Kennedy. With Yul Brynner, Robert Fuller, Julián Mateos, Warren Oates. Two survivors of the initial Magnificent Seven outfit, Chris and Vin, recruit four new members in order to re-form the outfit and defend a few Mexican villages from attacks by vicious bandits." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0060897/","name":"Return of the Seven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJjNTNhODUtZjBmZC00ZDdiLWI5ZjUtMmIxYWYxNzYyNDk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two survivors of the initial Magnificent Seven outfit, Chris and Vin, recruit four new members in order to re-form the outfit and defend a few Mexican villages from attacks by vicious bandits.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0060897/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"csrothwec","dateCreated":"2010-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Have to agree with the majority of reviews; a boring remake","reviewBody":"If the 'Godfather II' was THE example of why a gifted director might consider making a sequel to a great film, this turkey is the classic counter-example of why no-one should make one (leaving aside the obvious point about wanting to milk a very successful cash cow a second time around). The only actor from the first (truly magnificent) film to appear is Yul Brynner in the lead role and all of the others who appear are decidedly 'B list' (if that) character actors who simply do not have the charisma to awaken much interest in their 'stories' or fates amongst the audience. Some attempts are made at repeating the original film's reflections on life and the transitoriness of glory/earthly admiration but in comparison with, say, Robert Vaughan's nightmares in the original film, these are stilted and unconvincing, whilst also being delivered (like most of the dialogue in the film) in a wooden, unenthusiastic manner. Even the gun fights/action scenes are poorly composed and almost totally 'flat'. The only things the film has going for it really are Bernstein's music (identical to the original) and the presence of Brynner, who could always carry a scene or, as in this case, even a whole film. I doubt if anyone would want to sit through a viewing of it more than once, though. I also suppose that one should be charitable, given what was to follow in the form of the two subsequent 'sequels' after this (by which time even Brynner had jumped ship), both of which were absolutely and totally dire, leaving the original template of a truly immortal Japanese film which underlay the whole enterprise entirely (and mercifully) forgotten.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4079,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5,"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Action","Western"],"datePublished":"1966-10-19","keywords":"two gun holster,gun holster,gun,holster,double gun holster","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1893122073","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGZkYjQxNzAtMDBiMi00MzNkLTkxYzMtNGVmZWMyNjYzODE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGZkYjQxNzAtMDBiMi00MzNkLTkxYzMtNGVmZWMyNjYzODE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000989/","name":"Yul Brynner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298333/","name":"Robert Fuller","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0558290/","name":"Julián Mateos"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447944/","name":"Burt Kennedy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054562/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064766/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169540/","name":"Larry Cohen"],"duration":"PT1H35M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 8½
Huit et demi
programme.desc:
8½: Directed by Federico Fellini. With Marcello Mastroianni, Claudia Cardinale, Anouk Aimée, Sandra Milo. A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0056801/","name":"8½","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MTA0NjEzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg4NDYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0056801/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Stay_away_from_the_Metropol"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Too much & too little, somehow","reviewBody":"I saw this once when I was about 19 and processed about nothing from it. I remember liking the opening sequence and thinking the rest was an empty bore. Well, it's no longer a bore to me, at 36, and it's far from empty, but it's still not the masterpiece to me that it seems to be to most film fans.

The coolest thing about 8 1/2 is the way that it's clearly a film about the film itself... a film about a filmmaker who is making a film, whose analysis of the film he's working on is actually an analysis of the film you are watching - as you're watching it. Conceptually, it's brilliant - and it does do a very good job of making these layered themes work. However, it's simply not that exciting to watch overall - at nearly 2 1/2 hours, it is a bit of a challenge to enjoy all the way through. The movie somehow manages to simultaneously have so much going on, and still feel like so little is going on, for a great quantity of the run time. There are definitely some really phenomenal sequences - plenty of surrealism, often in visuals and sometimes in performance and dialogue. It's never DULL, but it's also not much fun.

To be honest, considering one of the over-arching themes is "infatuation with women", it's kind of ironic that the movie does not feature more memorable female characters. There's only one who's iconic but that's because her character represents "the devil" and she's only in a couple of quick scenes. Then, there's the stunning Claudia Cardinale who gets top billing but is actually only in about 1.5 scenes - and her primary scene is a very important one, one of the most important thematically, but, we don't really get much of HER from it. The rest just kind of redundantly trail off in nags throughout the movie - intentionally, but, it doesn't leave you with much. And Marcello Mastroianni's lead character Guido is a bit of a bore but he needs to be because that's kind of the point of the character. Again, it occurs with great purpose but it's simply not very entertaining to watch.

It's a complex film with a lot to offer, but not enough of what I enjoy about movies. It's a great accomplishment in a lot of ways, but I'll probably never watch it again.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113051,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"1963-02-16","keywords":"film director,adultery,man wears eyeglasses,mistress,spa","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"8 1/2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3475617817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGU4MTNiMjktNzBiNi00ZjA1LTliNGItMzExNGJiYTYxYjBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGU4MTNiMjktNzBiNi00ZjA1LTliNGItMzExNGJiYTYxYjBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for 8 1/2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000052/","name":"Marcello Mastroianni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000733/","name":"Anouk Aimée"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001012/","name":"Claudia Cardinale"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000019/","name":"Federico Fellini"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004944/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113968/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000019/","name":"Federico Fellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0280919/","name":"Ennio Flaiano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684083/","name":"Tullio Pinelli"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="
